entry.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
entry.content: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: RohitM-IN/SQLParser: sqlparser-devexpress is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL 'WHERE' clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.
entry.content: sqlparser-devexpress is a lightweight JavaScript library that converts SQL 'WHERE' clauses into an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) and transforms them into a DevExpress-compatible filter format. It supports dynamic parameter extraction, short-circuit optimization, and efficient state-based filtering.

entry.content: Simple Whiteboard is a simple and lightweight web component that can be integrated in any web application

entry.title: Prathewsh/ytd_downloader: YTD Downloader is a modern, lightweight, and high-performance YouTube video downloader. Built using Node.js, Express, yt-dlp, and vanilla JavaScript, this open-source project allows users to easily download YouTube videos in a variety of resolutions.
entry.content: YTD Downloader is a modern, lightweight, and high-performance YouTube video downloader. Built using Node.js, Express, yt-dlp, and vanilla JavaScript, this open-source project allows users to easily download YouTube videos in a variety of resolutions.

entry.title: emiryuksel/LiteBot: LiteBot is a minimal, multilingual chatbot built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — no backend, no APIs, no frameworks. It supports both Turkish and English, offers dark mode, sound notifications, and fully local scripted responses via JSON. Ideal for personal sites, demos, or lightweight integrations where simplicity and speed matter most.
entry.content: LiteBot is a minimal, multilingual chatbot built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript — no backend, no APIs, no frameworks. It supports both Turkish and English, offers dark mode, sound notifications, and fully local scripted responses via JSON. Ideal for personal sites, demos, or lightweight integrations where simplicity and speed matter most.

entry.title: jspreadsheet/openetl: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

entry.title: Sidmaz666/peachy: Peachy is a very minimal, lightweight, secure, and reactive front-end framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs). It offers a robust state management system (local, global and global with persistence), file-based routing, and a component-based architecture with full reactivity.
entry.content: Peachy is a very minimal, lightweight, secure, and reactive front-end framework designed for building Single Page Applications (SPAs). It offers a robust state management system (local, global and global with persistence), file-based routing, and a component-based architecture with full reactivity.

entry.title: geeth24/hypergo: A lightweight, self-hosted URL shortening service designed for internal team use. Create memorable shortcuts to frequently accessed resources within your organization.
